section.section:
Subject to § 8-405 of this subtitle and paragraph (2) of this subsection, the Secretary shall use the Unemployment Insurance Administration Fund to pay the administrative costs of this title including the costs of:
office space in accordance with § 8-421(c) of this subtitle; and
the surety bond of the State Treasurer under § 5-102.1 of the State Government Article for the Unemployment Insurance Administration Fund.

Money in the Unemployment Insurance Administration Fund received from a unit of the federal government or appropriated by the General Assembly to carry out this title may be used only for the purposes and in the amounts that the United States Secretary of Labor finds necessary to administer this title efficiently and properly.
